roleset.name: minor tremor that precedes a larger earthquake, from the same epicenter

example.name: foreshock-n
example.text: I recall the 5.1 magnitude foreshock in August 1989, a full six weeks before the 7.1 magnitude World Series (or Loma Prieta) Earthquake.
example.arg: in August 1989, a full six weeks before the 7.1 magnitude World Series (or Loma Prieta) Earthquake.

roleset.note: FORESHOCK-N NOTES: Added by Julia for earthquakes.
